description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Create amazing music easily with the most fun and powerful music creation tool on XBOX 360 - NOW UPDATED: Includes 2 more ways to send your song, the ability to download your songs as mp3 from the web  and so much more. If you haven't tried ezmuze+ yet, now is the time!
